task.title: Run a sample test case supplied with the project.

taskbody.context: This test will use the class library to generate and validate an instance of a CDA document. The output in the console window will show the example XML that was generated following by the validation results. The results should state "Document is Valid".

step.cmd: Right click on the "Main.java" file and select "Run As" and "Java Application" from the context menu.
